name: Cubix (Nikhil 123)
description:
Cubix is a simple 3D game where the main player is a cube which is totally in control of you.
Your goal is to clear the level within time limit. Your way is filled with many enemy cubes who will try their best to stop you to reach your goal. 
In your small journey, you have to make some choices between two or more paths. Choose anyone which you find easier or the one which should be right. 
Features:
-> Awesome controls
-> 5 exciting levels
-> New hurdles in each levels
-> Make wise choices between different path
-> Break the wall of negativity ( a small but exciting level hurdle)
And finally, the theme of the game jam for which this game was made is also applied. You have to think big (bada soch) in between some of the level to get the exact path right for you.
So, download the game now and yes comment your experience in the comment box.
Hope you would enjoy the game 🤗🤗 :)
